actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 2 (1d4) slashing damage plus 2 (1d4) fire damage.
actions.name: Claws

actions.description: The mephit exhales a 15- foot cone of scalding steam. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 10 Dexterity saving throw, taking 4 (1d8) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
actions.name: Steam Breath (Recharge 6)

traits.description: When the mephit dies, it explodes in a cloud of steam. Each creature within 5 feet of the mephit must succeed on a DC 10 Dexterity saving throw or take 4 (1d8) fire damage.
traits.name: Death Burst

traits.description: (1/Day). The mephit can innately cast blur, requiring no material components. Its innate spellcasting ability is Charisma.
traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
